item.description:
"The Eye in the Heart" is that part of us that sees what really is. It is total acceptance, it is the part of us that sees with the knowing and love of God. This love was made to flow out from our heart to other people. What stops this flow? It is the pain and suffering of present and past wounds.

In this workshop you will see what it is you are afraid of and what you need to do about it to get the waters of Life and the Love of God flowing through you freely.

For over 25 years, Father Peter Bowes has devoted his life in service to God as an ordained Priest and Master Teacher. As Co-Director of the Order of Christ Sophia, he teaches the ministers and guides the Centers of Light around the country. Known for his charisma and sense of humor, Father Peter is also an accomplished musician and author who has composed nine albums and three books about Mystical Christian teachings. He holds his Masters and Doctorate degrees in Educational Psychology. Father Peter lives at the Center of Light, Chicago.
item.name: Father Peter Presents - The Eye in the Heart - Dealing with Fear
